author: .paulharris
content: uint64 had to be quoted due to a JSON limitation, List[uint8] wouldn't have that limitation, so it could be a list of numbers technically, if that was the preference... As long as its not already used anywhere it's probably not a big issue either way, consistency would be nice for decoding though... (ie. all clients do the same encoding/decoding of that type and we dont have to handle both)
